page.title: 08RANSKILL POST OFFICE
page.content: Mrs D Parkin used to own a wooden shop nextto the chapel It was opened in 1910 We have had the post office since 1950 Dad gets up at 6.15 am. Then the two postman/ woman Mr Rhodes Mrs Storey start delivering. Dad go es for breakfast and starts back at work at 8 am.Teabreak 10.00 Lunch 12.30,1.30. Teabreak 3 pm closes at 5.30 pm. Most people have P.O.savings banks.Stamp collectors 12,Giro becoming more popular all the time. Employees -Mrs Lodge one day and mum helps full time.There are no such things as telegrams anymore.The postman comes from Retford to collect the mail at 4.55 pm. Dad has to balance the books every Friday night and finishes approximately 7pm We open Saturday 8 am -12.30 pm. This last year- June 84-85 has been hard work due to D.H.S.S strike.
